content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Factory at position (52.0, -84.0)
Consists of a furnace at position (52.0, -84.0) 

### Iron Plate Factory at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position (52.0, -82.0) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to extract items from a furnace
- Ensure the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.
- Make sure the furnace is not empty and has the required item to extract.
### Errors when trying to insert items into a furnace
- Ensure you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnace.
- Make sure the furnace is not full and has space for the item to be inserted.
